name: Intrusion Protocol
description: Intrusion Protocol is a classic challenging retro 2-D platformer. Play as a computer virus tasked with infiltrating an enemy network to retrieve mission-critical data. As you find the data you will uncover a story that reveals the secrets of your mysterious purpose.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 or Unbuntu Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 or Unbuntu Processor: 3GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 / R9 280 or better
